**R000132146 - Staffing Consultants**
=====================================================

**Notice of Request for Proposal**
---------------------------

**Publication Date:** 26 May 2023

**Closing Date:** 26 June 2023, 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

The Shared Services Canada invites all qualified vendors holding a Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement under Tier 2 to participate in this Request for Proposal (RFP). This requirement is for professional staffing services to support the organization's strategic and operational objectives.

**Background**
------------

The RFP is published under the TSPS Supply Arrangement (SA) E60ZT-18TSPS. The scope of work includes recruitment and staffing services for various professional positions. All terms and conditions of the SA will apply to the resulting contract.

**Eligibility Criteria**
----------------------

To be considered, vendors must meet the following criteria:

* Be holding a valid TSPS Supply Arrangement under Tier 2;
* Demonstrate a track record of delivering professional staffing services to federal government clients;
* Provide evidence of achieving applicable IT Graduate Support and Transition (GSIT) and/or the certificate of Expertise in Recruiting and Staffing (CER) or shown they be invited to participate by SPC;

**Proposal Requirements**
------------------------

The RFP requires respondents to submit a proposal outlining the following:

* Their understanding of the scope of work and the organizational requirements;
* Their approach, methodology, and tools for delivering the staffing services;
* Their staff composition, qualifications, and expertise;
* A desktop presentation and oral presentation outlining their understanding of the project objectives, scope of work, and their approach to deliver;
* A comprehensive inexperienced program toward workplace equity, diversity, and inclusion.

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

The Contracting Entity is Shared Services Canada, located at 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 2H8.

**Contact Information**
---------------------

For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

Krys Pikula
Email: [krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:krys.pikula@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
Phone: 613-668-2207

**Important Dates**
-------------------

* Proposal Receipt Deadline: 26 June 2023, 14:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)
* Evaluation Date: To be announced

**Submission Requirements**
---------------------------

The proposal must be submitted electronically through the Shared Services Canada Procurement portal.
